title: Topic 002 Question 035
body: You are building an app that will share user images.
You need to configure the app to perform the following actions when a user uploads an image:
•	Categorize the image as either a photograph or a drawing.
•	Generate a caption for the image.
The solution must minimize development effort.
Which two services should you include in the solution? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: object detection in Azure AI Computer Vision
content tags in Azure AI Computer Vision
image descriptions in Azure AI Computer Vision
image type detection in Azure AI Computer Vision
image classification in Azure AI Custom Vision
